name: beads-of-ruin
effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.
short_effect: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.
flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.
